meanings.definition: The act of closing or shutting something.
meanings.sent1: The closuring of the store happened at 9 p.m.
meanings.sent2: I heard the closuring of the door as I left the room.
meanings.sent3: The closuring of the book startled the cat, making it jump.
meanings.sent4: The closuring of the gate symbolized the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The loud closuring of the window made everyone turn their heads.

meanings.definition: The process of bringing something to an end or conclusion.
meanings.sent1: The closuring of the meeting was swift and efficient.
meanings.sent2: She felt relief after the closuring of the long project.
meanings.sent3: The closuring of the movie left the audience satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The closuring of the play left a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The closuring of the deal brought a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: The act of blocking or obstructing passage or access.
meanings.sent1: The closuring of the road caused a traffic jam.
meanings.sent2: The closuring of the tunnel delayed our journey.
meanings.sent3: The closuring of the path led to a funny adventure through the woods.
meanings.sent4: The closuring of the entrance made it challenging to get inside.
meanings.sent5: The closuring of the bridge created a barrier for the cars.
